justification: Cites B’s preference for consistency but then asks B to give up their workhorse RB for a volatile RB and a young, high-variance WR—misaligned with B’s values. Little separation of A’s playoff push from B’s incentives/needs (e.g., B’s TE weakness unaddressed). Trade is feasible but contextually weak for B’s roster and strategy. Rationale is brief and somewhat contradictory; acceptance probability appears overstated.
